mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no cartNo , c.goods_no goodsNo , g.goods_title goodsTitle , c.cart_amount cartAmount , (c.cart_amount * g.goods_price) totalPrice , f.goods_file_name goodsFileName , f.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file f ON f.goods_no = c.goods_no WHERE c.cart_no = #{cartNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( customer_mail , goods_no , cart_amount) VALUES( #{customerMail} , #{goodsNo} , #{cartAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no cartNo, g.goods_title goodsTitle, c.cart_amount cartAmount, g.goods_price goodsPrice, g.goods_no goodsNo FROM cart c JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no WHERE c.customer_mail = #{customerMail}
